body.p:
EXCELSIo
STATE OF NEW YORK.
Executive Department.
Albany. July 2d 1862
Sir:

I have the honor to inclose herewith a copy of the memorial recently presented to the President, and by him to Congress, in behalf of the State of New York in respect to adjusting its canals to the defence of the Northern and Northwestern Lakes. In view of the manifestly great importance to the National defence and National commerce, of this measure, I desire to ask your particular attention to the subject represented therein.

I am, with much respect
Your obdt. servant.
E. D. Morgan

His Excellency
Beriah Magoffin
Governor &c. &c. &c.
Frankfort
Kentucky
Letter from the Governor in regard to enlarging Canals by Genl Government
